description: For two years, Amazon has refused to recognize its single unionized warehouse, organized by the upstart Amazon Labor Union. Now the hefty Teamsters is lending its muscle to the union effort.
title: Amazon's struggling union joins forces with the Teamsters

description: The Tustin Police Department in California says investigators are still looking for the suspect or suspects. President Biden was visiting the state for a star-studded campaign fundraiser.
title: A Secret Service agent was robbed at gunpoint on the night of Biden's L.A. fundraiser

description: Plus: How to deal with a new partner who's attractive ... but messy.
title: Dear Life Kit: I'm ashamed that I still dream about my middle school crush

description: The singer and actor was arrested early Tuesday on Long Island and arraigned later that morning.
title: Justin Timberlake was arrested for driving while intoxicated in the Hamptons

description: Russia and North Korea's leaders are expected to demonstrate their deepening military and political relationship, built on cooperation on Russia's war in Ukraine. But experts doubt its sustainability.
title: Putin and Kim Jong Un will meet in North Korea, supporter of Russia's war in Ukraine

description: Russia and North Korea's leaders are expected to demonstrate their deepening military and political relationship, built on cooperation on Russia's war in Ukraine. But experts doubt its sustainability.
title: Putin and Kim Jung Un will meet in North Korea, supporter of Russia's war in Ukraine

description: Niki Capaci, 40, died in May 2023 after three days in the custody of a New York jail. Her family is suing the jail, claiming its medical provider, Wellpath, failed to treat her for opioid withdrawal.
title: She died in a New York jail. Her family still has questions, alleges medical neglect

description: You'll need a hug after Shadow of the Erdtree gets its claws around you. The follow-up to the 2022 gaming phenomenon presents a new realm to explore, new mysteries to unravel, and new bosses to get utterly demolished by.
title: ‘Shadow of the Erdtree’ is a confounding delight that wants to kill you with kindness

description: It's a depressingly familiar story — devastating floods triggered by climate change — but with an Afghanistan twist.
title: How the Taliban adds to Afghanistan's woes when it comes to climate-fueled disasters

description: Celebrity influencers are promoting the pricey scans to catch disease early, but a doctor argues the U.S. should focus instead on reaching everyone with proven screenings and prevention strategies.
title: Full body scans miss the mark when it comes to improving U.S. disease prevention

description: Machine translation of foreign languages has been good for a while. And yet human translators are still in demand. Why isn’t AI killing these jobs? And even if it isn’t, how is it reshaping them?
title: If AI is so good, why are there still so many jobs for translators?

description: The Federal Emergency Management Agency has never responded to deadly or damaging extreme heat. Environmental groups and labor unions are asking for that to change.
title: Why isn’t extreme heat considered a disaster in the U.S.?

description: Executive actions from the White House will offer parole to up to half a million immigrants
title: Biden's plan will shield undocumented spouses of U.S. citizens from deportation

description: Minnesota lawmakers set aside $100,000 for the formerly stolen pair this year and the Judy Garland Museum hopes a benevolent figure can help win them at auction.
title: Judy Garland’s hometown hopes a good witch will help purchase Dorothy’s ruby slippers
